content:
Not very clear statement for me. What is the spatial area ? One line or the entire zone ?  We got m number of explosions allowed in the spatial area but with your solution you have more because replace in python can replace more than one . No ?
i have done it in clash like that:
n = int(input())
m = int(input())
for i in range(n):
    spacedata = list(input())
    for j in range(len(spacedata)):
        if spacedata[j]=="#" and m>0:spacedata[j]="-";m-=1
        if spacedata[j]=="-" and m>0:spacedata[j]=".";m-=1
    print("".join(spacedata))

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: fun easy clash especially for fastest mode.

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: This contribution is definitely on the easier side but is at least some speed with doing the replacements.

Nice one ! But I had to do it in Ruby instead of PHP because of the  '¤' char (special char so in certain languages it is counted for 2 or 3 bytes instead of 1 in python or ruby for example - thus, it is a mess to resolve your clash for certain language)
Maybe you should use another char to be sure that any player can do your clash.
Meanwhile, I upvote it !

Goal section
* Please format all the fixed characters as {{constants}} and remove the quotation marks (e.g. {{#}}).

* Please add explanation of what happens at a cleaning step.

Input section
* Suggest to swap the order of n and m so that n and spacedata are next to each other.

* Please add line numbers in bold, i.e. <<Line 1>>, <<Line 2>> and <<Next [[n]] lines>>.

* Please change "(sample size)" to a more fitting description (e.g. "of spatial data").

Output section
* Please add <<[[n]] lines>>.

Constraints section
* Please change the lower limit of n as 1 as it doesn't make sense to have no input and hence no required output.

Cases
* Please do not use non-ASCII characters. CodinGame's console area cannot display such characters correctly and it'll make debugging hard. For your reference, below is the output if I run the default code for the "not enough cleaning steps !" test:

Failure
Found: cleaned area
Expected: \-62\-92.\-62\-92

* Each pair of test and validator should be similar. If necessary, you may add additional pairs of cases.
(e.g. currently "don't want to clean ?" validator is the only case where m = 0 and there's no corresponding test).

Thanks.

Hello everyone :)
This is my first CoC contribution, I hope you'll like it. 
If there's anything that needs to be changed, please let me know !

Thanks ! It's fixed now ✔
I replace the ¤ by - 
I hope it works...
Sorry but it looks you just changed the statement and not the tests/validators...

Sorry ! 
It's fixed now (I guess).
All ¤ char in the tests/validators are now - char
I've also made test pairs looking more similar.

Goal section
* Please mention that each explosion affects the entire area. (I originally thought each explosion affected a single object only.)

Output section
* Please delete "The".

* Please add ":" between "lines" and "cleaned".

Cases
* As mentioned last time, please update the cases because each pair of test and validator should be similar. If necessary, you may add additional pairs of cases. (e.g. currently "don't want to clean ?" validator is the only case where m = 0 and there's no corresponding test).

Thanks again.

Done ✔
I've made the test peers looking more similar. I hope it's fine now.

Hi, the additional cases look good, but the pairing may be improved. The similarity should be in terms of what is being tested, instead of just similarity of the input grid.

(below, "<=>" denotes "similar to")
• "just a meteorite" <=> "now it's meteorites' turn"
• "just an asteroid" <=> "asteroids rain becomes meteorites rain !"
• "not enough explosions !" <=> "HEAVY CLEANING - PART 2"
• "all seems quiet... just 1 in case ?" <=> "no need to clean"
• "better more than less" <=> "more explosions !!!" (this pair is ok)
• "too dangerous : no explosions !" <=> (no similar case of m=0 with asteroids and meteorites)
• "HEAVY CLEANING - PART 1" <=> (no similar case of m=2)

So it's better to swap around the cases and add two more.

Hope this clarifies.

Done ✔
I swap some cases and add two more. 
thanks for ur feedbacks :)
